Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: GHC.Types.Module{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module Foreign.Storable_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import GHC.Ptr_LHAssumptions()
 6: import Foreign.Storable
 7: 
 8: {-@
 9: predicate PValid P N         = ((0 <= N) && (N < (plen P)))
10: 
11: assume Foreign.Storable.poke        :: (Foreign.Storable.Storable a)
12:                              => {v: (GHC.Ptr.Ptr a) | 0 < (plen v)}
13:                              -> a
14:                              -> (GHC.Types.IO ())
15: 
16: assume Foreign.Storable.peek        :: (Foreign.Storable.Storable a)
17:                              => p:{v: (GHC.Ptr.Ptr a) | 0 < (plen v)}
18:                              -> (GHC.Types.IO {v:a | v = (deref p)})
19: 
20: assume Foreign.Storable.peekByteOff :: (Foreign.Storable.Storable a)
21:                              => forall b. p:(GHC.Ptr.Ptr b)
22:                              -> {v:GHC.Types.Int | (PValid p v)}
23:                              -> (GHC.Types.IO a)
24: 
25: assume Foreign.Storable.pokeByteOff :: (Foreign.Storable.Storable a)
26:                              => forall b. p:(GHC.Ptr.Ptr b)
27:                              -> {v:GHC.Types.Int | (PValid p v)}
28:                              -> a
29:                              -> GHC.Types.IO ()
30: @-}
